description: Base 8 digits are, in order, the first n terms of the periodic sequence with initial period 1,1,2.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (8,0,1,-8).
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Corrected by Franklin T. Adams-Watters, Oct 25 2006
